# This file is autogenerated
title: loginWithOauth
description: Overview of the loginWithOauth method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/signer/classes/AuthClient/loginWithOauth
---

Initiates OAuth authentication with the specified provider.
This method handles the complete OAuth flow including provider URL generation and response processing.

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/signer";
```

## Usage

```ts
const signer = await authClient.loginWithOauth({
  type: "oauth",
  authProviderId: "google",
  mode: "popup",
});
```

## Parameters

### params

`LoginWithOauthParams`

- Parameters for OAuth authentication

### params.authProviderId

`string`

- OAuth provider identifier (e.g., "google", "facebook")

### params.scope

`string`

- OAuth scope parameters

### params.claims

`string`

- OAuth claims parameters

### params.otherParameters

`Record<string, string>`

- Additional OAuth parameters

### params.mode

`"popup" | "redirect"`

- OAuth flow mode, defaults to "redirect"

## Returns

`Promise<Signer>`
Promise that resolves to an authenticated Signer instance
